Author: GitHub
Description:
According to a recent survey from The Pragmatic Engineer, GitHub Copilot is now the most used AI tool among developers. We've officially crossed the line from a cool experiment to an essential part of the modern developer workflow. Are you part of the 50% using it?

#GitHubCopilot #ChatGPT #AI

Title: GitHub Copilot just overtook ChatGPT for developers
